page.title: 18MYTTON & FITZ-LANDSCAPE
page.content: {MITTON & FITZ}_ LANDSCAPE & BUILDINGS The landscape in the Mitton & Fitz area is dominated by a huge river _ the Severn,which is about 30 metres wide.It meanders fairly near Mytton. In Mytton on the second of July 1985,there is planning consent for the erection of 3 semi _ detatched houses with garages,in the stackyard of Mytton farm.Buildway cottage in Mytton is for sale for around Â£22,500. There are 15 houses at Mytton and 30 people in Fitz.There is a manor at Fitz dating back to 1450.It has an attractive Elizabethan -style garden,preserved,close to Fitz church.Fitz church has a steeple & a bell and dates in its present form from the 18th Century.
